title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Ministers of State at the Department of Health) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (ministers state department health) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Mary 
Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health with effect from 10 April
text_norm: 2 corona joyce particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser mary butler minister state department health effect 10 april

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: Ian Hutchinson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. 

Ian Hutchinson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Colm 
Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Health with effect from 7 May
text_norm: 3 ian hutchinson particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser colm burke minister state department health effect 7 may

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal
text_raw:
2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

5 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th June, 2024.
